summary: The diff clearly adds the required canonical link tag in `frontend/index.html` and updates the custom-domain setup documentation to present `https://pccomputerandcommunication.com` as the primary URL while noting the IC-provided URL remains available. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that all user-visible frontend references (UI text/links) that previously pointed to the IC-provided URL were updated to the custom domain, nor can it confirm that navigation/hash scrolling behavior remains unbroken.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update any user-visible references (UI text, links, documentation) that currently point to the IC-provided URL so they instead point to `https://pccomputerandcommunication.com`, while keeping the IC-provided URL working as an alternate access URL.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes documentation updates and the canonical tag, but does not show any concrete frontend UI text/link changes (e.g., in `Header`, `Hero`, `Footer`, etc.) that replace IC-provided URLs with the custom domain. From the provided diffs, only `frontend/DOMAIN_CONNECTION_INSTRUCTIONS.md` and `frontend/index.html` content is evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: No existing navigation, deep links (hash navigation), or section scrolling behavior is broken by these changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not include enough detail (tests, explicit confirmation, or relevant code changes) to verify that hash navigation/scrolling behavior remains intact after changes.
